original_title: Bitcoin: The Future Of Money And Facebook's Libra
overview: The way we spend money has been changed forever thanks to the introduction of cryptocurrency. With these changes one of the biggest and most controversial social media companies ever, Facebook, has arrived just in time to change all of the rules again... The future of money is at hand and all we have to do is "Like" it!
title: Bitcoin: The Future Of Money And Facebook's Libra
